title: Bacon and avocado salad
ingredients: ['4 rashers bacon', '1 avocado, stoned', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', '1 teaspoon honey', '1 tablespoon Worcestershire sauce', '2 tablespoons water', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1 handful rocket leaves', '1 handful spring salad greens', '1 red pepper, sliced', '2 spring onions, sliced']
